course.subject: CORE
course.name: Studio Arts Workshops: Cantonese Opera
course.description: This course will allow students enrolled to CORE 1661 Cantonese Opera in Hong Kong Culture to have hands-on experience of Cantonese Opera. Students will learn the four basic performance skills of Cantonese opera, namely, singing, reciting, acting and fencing. Graded DI/PA/F.
course.prerequisites: a passing letter grade in CORE 1401 OR CORE 1402 OR CORE 1403 OR CORE 1404 OR LANG 1002 (prior to 2022-23)
course.corequisites: CORE 1661, HUMA 1671
